segments.text: I see a woman completely absorbed in her task, drying a plate as if the world around her has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the overflowing sink, the water gushing out and forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange that she doesn’t notice the chaos right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world looks so serene through the window, almost mocking the disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so focused on a single plate while everything else is slipping away?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are plotting their little scheme, reaching for cookies as if they’re stealing treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the tension building; that stool looks like it could topple any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl standing there with her hand out, she’s fiercely eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how unaware the adult is, but the risks are so real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder how this scene will play out; will it end in laughter or a crash?
segments.speaker: PAR
